sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Private Primary Residential Flood Insurance Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Private Primary Residential Flood Insurance Act.

sections.heading: Purpose. To provide protection of lives and property from the peril of flood, this Act is designed to encourage a robust private primary residential flood insurance market to provide consumer choices and alternatives to the existing National Flood Insurance Program
